00010 FileAuthController::FileAuthController(string filename,string delimiter) {
00011         this->filename = filename;
00012         this->delimiter = delimiter;
00013 }

00019 string FileAuthController::treat_password(string password)
00020 {
00021         return password;
00022 }
00023 
00024 bool FileAuthController::isInitialized()
00025 {
00026         ifstream ifs(this->filename.c_str());
00027         bool fl = ifs.is_open();
00028         ifs.close();
00029         return fl;
00030 }
00031 
00032 bool FileAuthController::authenticate(string username,string password)
00033 {
00034         password = treat_password(password);
00035         string userstamp = (username + delimiter + password);
00036         ifstream ifs(this->filename.c_str());
00037         if(ifs.is_open())
00038         {
00039                 string temp;
00040                 while(getline(ifs, temp))
00041                 {
00042                         if(userstamp==temp)
00043                         {
00044                                 ifs.close();
00045                                 return true;
00046                         }
00047                 }
00048                 ifs.close();
00049         }
00050         return false;
00051 }
00052 
00053 bool FileAuthController::getPassword(string username,string &passwd)
00054 {
00055         string userstamp = (username + delimiter);
00056         ifstream ifs(this->filename.c_str());
00057         bool passwdf = false;
00058         if(ifs.is_open() && username!="")
00059         {
00060                 string temp;
00061                 while(getline(ifs, temp))
00062                 {
00063                         if(temp.find(userstamp)!=string::npos)
00064                         {
00065                                 passwdf = true;
00066                                 ifs.close();
00067                                 passwd = temp.substr(temp.find(delimiter)+1);
00068                                 break;
00069                         }
00070                 }
00071                 ifs.close();
00072         }
00073         return passwdf;
00074 }
